dotnetType.name: MapSchemaBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary: A schema builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" />.

overloads.summary: Creates a new map schema builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" /> build result if <paramref name="resolution" /> is
            a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.MapResolution" />; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            build result otherwise.

overloads.summary: A schema builder instance that will be used to resolve map value types.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MapSchemaBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Abstract.SchemaBuilderCase
